DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to demonstrate a long term efficacy of S18986 versus placebo on episodic memory performance in patients with MCI
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of S18986 in the Treatment of Mild Cognitive Impairment Patients
DOC.criteria: Memory complaint Acetylcholinesterase inhibitors stopped at least 3 months before selection Dementia Parkinson's disease Vascular disorder Depression Epilepsy
